reviewText:
If you ever wanted to play piano, this is your go to product!  They are easy to understand, fun to do, and you can honestly learn to play a song almost immediately!!!  Perfect for young or old - but especially wonderful for retired folks who want to keep their minds active...I have found it very helpful, and my 12 year old grandson went through it and was playing songs before his weekend visit was over.

My order arrived much quicker than expected in perfect condition.

This DVD is amazing! I am a verified buyer and I decided to try a learn how to play the piano and so far it's been great. I never thought I could learn how to play but now I am a true believer. I did three 20 min sessions over three days. Watch the video and see for your self.
